mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO success_killed (seckill_id, user_phone) VALUES (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id AS "seckill.seckillId", s.name AS "seckill.name", s.number AS "seckill.number", s.start_time AS "seckill.startTime", s.end_time AS "seckill.endTime", s.create_time AS "seckill.createTime" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN sekill s ON sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId}
